Text: AIMR Deferred Membership ApplicationPST July Candidate FOLLOWUP NOTICE Dear Mr McKay Thank you for your interest in the Association for Investment Management and Research AIMR On your Level III Enrollment AIMR Society Chapter Membership Form you indicated that you wished to apply for AIMR membership after passing Level III Now that the exam is over AIMR invites you to take this opportunity to activate your membership application Although the results of the Level III exam are not currently available we encourage you to complete your membership application today to avoid any delays in the eventual award of the CFA charter upon successful completion of Level III Please note that one of the requirements to be awarded the CFA charter is to fulfill AIMR membership requirements and apply concurrently for membership in AIMR and in an AIMR member society or chapter if a society or chapter is located less than miles km of a candidates place of business If you work more than miles km from an AIMR member society or chapter please notify us in writing if you would like to receive an exemption The award of the CFA charter is contingent upon completion of all requirements To complete the processing of your membership application we need your society preference and appropriate sponsor forms All application materials are valid for one year Please review all sponsor requirements on AIMRs website at memservicesjoinrequirementsasp All sponsor forms and related materials can be downloaded from AIMRs website at memservicesjoinapplyasp or you may call to request these forms Please contact AIMRs Information Central department at tel or fax or email if you have any questions regarding the status of your membership request Sincerely Candidate Member Services
